attributes.action: Look into Recycling- it is unfair to put all the blame on the public & charge us?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government should re visit and look at the issue of recycling, Supermarkets, suppliers, manufactories, are the biggest culprits of causing mountains of rubbish, supermarkets should stop using unrecycable products for packaging, manufactories should reduce the size of packaging,  I could go on (but I think you should get the point), they are the ones that should be penalized (with fines)for a lot of the excess rubbish not the public.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
